description: This file contains a utility function 'parseVoice' that processes voice transcript strings to extract structured search filters for a food ordering application. It identifies cuisines, order intents, fulfillment methods, price limits, and other relevant keywords.

methods.name: parseVoice
methods.description: Parses a raw transcript string into a structured ParsedFilters object, extracting cuisines, order intent, fulfillment method, price ceiling, and other relevant details.
